headline: Race for Ohio’s Senate seat: Josh Mandel
author: fox8webcentral
sentences: After the longtime politician announced he would not seek another term, at least four Republicans have entered the race.
FOX 8’s Joe Toohey sat down with one of those candidates: former Ohio Treasurer Josh Mandel.
